page.title: 08Cwmfelinfach School
page.content: Our school isn't a very big building. It was built in 1909 and it has ten classrooms and a nursery unit. Seven rooms have classes in them,one room is used as a library,another as a TV room and the last as a music room.We have a playground but no playing fields. Recently a new cloakroom-corridor and inside toilets were added to the school.Last year two infant classrooms were changed into a nursery for very young children.We do not have a canteen,our meals are cooked in another school and brought to us in a taxi.We eat them in our hall.Children start at our school when they are four and move through the classes until they reach eleven when pupils transfer to Pontllanfraith Comprehensive Sch. Besides normal lessons we do swimming, educational dance,gymnastics,netball, rugby,soccer and Field Courses.
